Addendum-III to AVSEC Circular No. 23/2005
Subject:’ Procedure for EDS screening of passengers, persons other than
passengers and their belongings.

In, exercise of powers conferred under rules 31, 32 and 62 of the Aircraft
(Security) Rules, 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security, for
the purpose of the salcty of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general
public in all matters relating to safeguarding against act of unlawful interference
with civil aviation, dirccts for partial modification to AvSec Circular No. 23/2005
dated 11.7.2005

2. Para: 11 with its sub-paras: (11.1-11.5) are added after sub-para:10.9 of
Para: 10: ‘Screeening and hand search environments’ in AC-23/2005, which
reads as under:

11. SCREENING OF PASSENGERS, CABIN BAGGAGE, PERSONS OTHER
THAN PASSENGERS AND THEIR BELONGINGS THROUGH EDS (EXPLOSIVE
DETECTION SYSTEM).

11.1 Passengers: Explosive Detection System (EDS) checks shall be carried out
on passengers and their cabin baggage in random and unpredictable manner
(10%) for detecting the presence of explosives and explosive devices.

11.2 Passengers with plaster cast: DS checks shall be carried out on all
passengers with plaster cast and their cabin baggage for detecting the presence
of explosives and explosive devices. Such passengers shall be subjected to full
patdown search.

11.3 Persons other than passengers: Persons other than passengers & their
belongings, entering into SRAs, shall be checked using EDS in random and
unpredictable manner (10%) for detecting the presence’ of explosives and
explosive devices.

11.4 Persons other than passengers, with plaster cast: All persons other

than passengers, with plaster cast andytheir belongings shall be checked by
